title: Christmas skins idea for you @Riot!
body:
Its near Christmas and I know your working/and or already have skins being prepared.
So here's a few additional Ideas.
Christmas Turkey Azir! < I just thought this would be funny.
Little Elf Ekko.
Santa Claws Braum.
Reindeer X Rek-sai < You have kog so I thought he should get a friend.
ST Barnard Nasus < Truth be told I think those would be awesome.

replies.body:
A few more I have thought of, thought I would add to yours rather than start my own.

Jolly st. Nick, tahm kench {{champion:223}} that laugh, sleigh bells when he ults, bursts out of the ground with presents flying, spits out champs and minions with a bow on their head.

Polar express rumble {{champion:68}} based on the conductor in the film, tickets pls his mech on the train.

The grinch and max the reigndog kindred, a single antler and red nose on wolf, a misfit Santa outfit on lamb, kind of a role change in personality though.

Chistmas pudding zac{{champion:154}}  that cherry on top, a bit of fun can be had with this.

Santa's helper or st. Nick himself bard {{champion:432}}, leaves gifts of healing and jingle bells on his journey, his ult surrounds the area in snow and gifts for a brief while, frozen enemies are surrounded/encased in ribbons. Meeps could be elf-like or have little Santa hats.
Oooh I actually like all of those XD

no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no B{{champion:432}} raum cant be santa, Bard is the next santa!
